titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I finished the sermon for All Souls. Sir Leslie & Lady Rundle lunched here. I instituted the Incumbents of Kinlet and Lower Sapey. I wrote to M
Bulmer begging her to assist me by inducing her husband to resign Canon Pyon on January 1
Craven, the Vicar of Stretford, accepting his offer to hand over the patronage of that little parish to me, & promising to urge the Diocesan Board to make him a grant.
